member.name: T:VDS.RDF.Skos.SkosCollection
member.summary: Represents a labelled group of SKOS concepts.

member.name: M:VDS.RDF.Skos.SkosCollection.#ctor(VDS.RDF.INode,VDS.RDF.IGraph)
member.summary: Creates a new collection for the given resource.
member.param: Graph containing the resource representing the collection.

member.name: P:VDS.RDF.Skos.SkosCollection.Member
member.summary: Gets the members of the collection.

member.name: T:VDS.RDF.Skos.SkosConcept
member.summary: Represents a SKOS concept.

member.name: M:VDS.RDF.Skos.SkosConcept.#ctor(VDS.RDF.INode,VDS.RDF.IGraph)
member.summary: Creates a new concept for the given resource.

member.name: P:VDS.RDF.Skos.SkosConcept.InScheme
member.summary: Gets the concept schemes the concept is contained in.

member.name: P:VDS.RDF.Skos.SkosConcept.TopConceptOf
member.summary: Get the concept schemes the concept is the top concept of.

member.name: P:VDS.RDF.Skos.SkosConcept.PrefLabel
member.summary: Gets the preferred labels of the concept.

member.name: P:VDS.RDF.Skos.SkosConcept.AltLabel
member.summary: Gets the alternative labels of the concept.

member.name: P:VDS.RDF.Skos.SkosConcept.HiddenLabel
member.summary: Gets the hidden labels of the concept.

member.name: P:VDS.RDF.Skos.SkosConcept.Notation
member.summary: Gets a unique identifiers of the concept in a given concept scheme.

member.name: P:VDS.RDF.Skos.SkosConcept.Note
member.summary: Gets the general notes of the concept.

member.name: P:VDS.RDF.Skos.SkosConcept.ChangeNote
member.summary: Gets the modification notes of the concept.

member.name: P:VDS.RDF.Skos.SkosConcept.Definition
member.summary: Gets the formal explanation of the concept.

member.name: P:VDS.RDF.Skos.SkosConcept.EditorialNote
member.summary: Gets the editorial notes the concept.

member.name: P:VDS.RDF.Skos.SkosConcept.Example
member.summary: Gets examples of the use of the concept.

member.name: P:VDS.RDF.Skos.SkosConcept.HistoryNote
member.summary: Gets notes about the past of the concept.

member.name: P:VDS.RDF.Skos.SkosConcept.ScopeNote
member.summary: Gets notes that help to clarify the meaning and/or the use of the concept.

member.name: P:VDS.RDF.Skos.SkosConcept.SemanticRelation
member.summary: Gets concepts related by meaning.

member.name: P:VDS.RDF.Skos.SkosConcept.Broader
member.summary: Gets more general concepts.

member.name: P:VDS.RDF.Skos.SkosConcept.Narrower
member.summary: Gets more specific concepts.

member.name: P:VDS.RDF.Skos.SkosConcept.Related
member.summary: Gets associated concepts.

member.name: P:VDS.RDF.Skos.SkosConcept.BroaderTransitive
member.summary: Gets more general concepts (transitive).

member.name: P:VDS.RDF.Skos.SkosConcept.NarrowerTransitive
member.summary: Gets more specific concepts (transitive).

member.name: P:VDS.RDF.Skos.SkosConcept.MappingRelation
member.summary: Gets concepts with comparable meaning from other concept schemes.

member.name: P:VDS.RDF.Skos.SkosConcept.CloseMatch
member.summary: Gets confidently interchangeable concepts from other concept schemes.

member.name: P:VDS.RDF.Skos.SkosConcept.ExactMatch
member.summary: Gets interchangeably similar concepts from other concept schemes.

member.name: P:VDS.RDF.Skos.SkosConcept.BroadMatch
member.summary: Gets more general concepts from other concept schemes.

member.name: P:VDS.RDF.Skos.SkosConcept.NarrowMatch
member.summary: Gets more specific concepts from other concept schemes.

member.name: P:VDS.RDF.Skos.SkosConcept.RelatedMatch
member.summary: Gets associated concepts from other concept schemes.

member.name: T:VDS.RDF.Skos.SkosConceptScheme
member.summary: Represents an aggregation of one or more SKOS concepts.

member.name: M:VDS.RDF.Skos.SkosConceptScheme.#ctor(VDS.RDF.INode,VDS.RDF.IGraph)
member.summary: Creates a new concept schemes for the given resource.
member.param: The graph containing the concept scheme.

member.name: P:VDS.RDF.Skos.SkosConceptScheme.HasTopConcept
member.summary: Gets the top concepts of the concept scheme.

member.name: T:VDS.RDF.Skos.SkosGraph
member.summary: Represents a wrapper around a SKOS graph providing convenient access to concepts, schemes, and collections.

member.summary: Creates a new SKOS graph.
member.param: The name to assign to the SKOS graph.

member.summary: Creates a new SKOS graph for the given graph.

member.summary: Gets concept schemes contained in the graph.

member.summary: Gets concepts contained in the graph.

member.summary: Gets collections contained in the graph.

member.summary: Gets ordered collections contained in the graph.
